about_the_game:
Welcome to Lynxvale – a town forgotten by time, where shadows whisper and the past refuses to stay buried.

In Tales of Ancients, you step into the shoes of Alex, a determined researcher obsessed with unraveling the true origins of creation. Drawn by cryptic clues and forbidden knowledge, you find yourself in Lynxvale, where an ancient cult, forgotten tunnels, and the echoes of lost souls await.

This demo offers a glimpse into the eerie atmosphere, deep exploration, and psychological horror that defines the full game. Venture through Alex’s apartment, uncover hidden messages, and follow the trails of those who vanished while investigating the mysteries surrounding Umbra Lake. But beware—some secrets should never be uncovered.

What Awaits You in the Demo?

✔ Immersive Horror Atmosphere – Experience the tension of an abandoned town where reality bends.
✔ Story-Driven Exploration – Discover journals, forgotten notes, and disturbing artifacts that unravel Lynxvale’s dark past.
✔ Psychological Horror Elements – Encounter unsettling visions, cryptic whispers, and inexplicable occurrences.
✔ Puzzles and Environmental Storytelling – Investigate your surroundings and piece together the forgotten history of the town.
✔ Cinematic Narrative Experience – A carefully crafted horror mystery that unfolds with every step you take.

Can you uncover the truth, or will the town consume you like those before you?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 21H2 or above
  • Processor: Intel i3/i5 or equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 21H2 or above
  • Processor: Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 TI
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
